General.Name: METALL ZUG AG Part. Cert.
General.Description: Metall Zug AG, through its subsidiaries, engages in the medical devices, infection control, technologycluster and infrastructure, and other businesses in Switzerland, rest of Europe, the Americas, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. The Medical Devices business unit develops, produces, and distributes diagnosis and microsurgery products primarily in the fields of ophthalmology, as well as covers applications in the fields of pulmonology and measuring instruments. This business unit offers diagnostics products, including slit lamps, biometry, perimetry, tonometer, and practice management software for clinics and opticians, as well as practice equipment; and surgical products, such as microscopes, floor and roof stands, and accessories. The Infection Control business unit provides cleaning, disinfection, and sterilization solutions that are used in hospitals. The Technologycluster & Infrastructure business unit engages in the management and development of real estate. The Others business unit offers cleaning, disinfection, and sterilization solutions primarily for use in the pharmaceutical industry. It also engages in supply of dishwashers, thermal equipment, coffee machines, and cleaning agents. It serves gastronomy, hotel, and tourism sectors. Metall Zug AG was founded in 1887 and is headquartered in Zug, Switzerland.
